content: S-MD-HWH 1/4, #3 Self-drilling metal screws Self-drilling screw (zinc-plated carbon steel) without washer for light-medium gauge metal-to-metal fastenings (up to 0.22 in) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Self-drilling screw for fast assembly in one step Zinc electroplate coating for indoor use Faster, more robust drill tip For more reliable fastenings with defined load values Applications Fastening sheet metal and profiles to steel substructures and framing, with or without intermediate insulation layers Galvanized carbon steel for fastening in dry, indoor environments Thin to medium-thick metal-to-metal connections (up to 0.22 in) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw drive/recess type: 3/8 Hexagon Base materials: Carbon steel Environmental Conditions: Dry indoor Technical Data | Screw drive/recess type | 5/16 Hexagon, 3/8 Hexagon | Base materials | Carbon steel | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor ### ITEMS- 2099048 - Self-drill screw S-MD1/4-14x3/4 HWH3 - Package Size 4000 pc - 2099049 - Self-drill screw S-MD1/4-14x1 HWH3 - Package Size 3000 pc - 2099050 - Self-drill screw S-MD1/4-14x1 1/2HWH3 - Package Size 2000 pc - 2099051 - Self-drill screw S-MD1/4-14x2 HWH3 - Package Size 1000 pc
